simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Makes a file system on the target

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_DRIVE_NOT_CREATED if the OS calls to create the the drive failed
OS_FS_ERR_DEVICE_NOT_FREE if the volume table is full

OS_FS_ERR_DEVICE_NOT_FREE if the volume table is full

parameterdescription.para: Mount point for the file system

simplesect.title: Description

simplesect.title: Description

simplesect.para: The 64 bit data type to support filesystems that are greater than 4 Gigabytes

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Because of the abstraction of the filesystem across OSes, we have to change the name of the {file, directory, drive} to be what the OS can actually accept
